SEARCH
Package com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.service

Class AnalysisServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.service.AnalysisServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnalysisService
@Service public class AnalysisServiceImpl extends Object implements AnalysisService
Implementation of the AnalysisService interface. Provides methods to calculate various popularity metrics in the domain of fashion trends.
